author: Peteyking64
title: Not the best
review:
This game isn't the best lego game.Look at the pros and cons on how poor this game is.

Pros

  • Great car selection
  • Pretty sick courses

Cons

  • Goes very fast,you can barely control it good 
  • It's very confusing
  • It slows down when ever you go over a hump
  • In a desert course,it's the most confusing course ever!

It's not that good but ok!
